class="main-content" role="main"> <h# Calendar<h2 class="fs-4" id="behavior-of-large-language-models" > <a href="#behavior-of-large-language-models" class="anchor-heading" aria-labelledby="behavior-of-large-language-models"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" aria-hidden="true"><use xlink:href="#svg-link"></use></svg></a> Behavior of large language models</h2><div class="module"><dl><dt>Mon Jan 3<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/introduction">Introduction</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Why does this course exist?<li>Language models<li>Overview of the course</ol><dt>Wed Jan 5<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/capabilities">Capabilities</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Adaptation framework<li>Perplexity<li>Prompting<li>Overview of GPT-3 tasks</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2108.07258.pdf">On the Opportunities and Risks of Foundation Models</a> (section 1, excluding 1.4).</ul><dt>Mon Jan 10<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/harms-1">Harms I</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Rishi Bommasani</em><dd><ol><li>Performance disparities<li>Social bias and stereotypes</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3442188.3445922">On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots: Can Language Models Be Too Big? ðŸ¦œ</a></ul><dt>Wed Jan 12<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/harms-2">Harms II</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Toxicity<li>Disinformation</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2009.11462.pdf">RealToxicityPrompts: Evaluating Neural Toxic Degeneration in Language Models</a></ul></dl></div><h2 class="fs-4" id="data-behind-large-language-models" > <a href="#data-behind-large-language-models" class="anchor-heading" aria-labelledby="data-behind-large-language-models"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" aria-hidden="true"><use xlink:href="#svg-link"></use></svg></a> Data behind large language models</h2><div class="module"><dl><dt>Mon Jan 17<dd>(no class - MLK day)<dt>Wed Jan 19<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/data">Data</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Scrutiny of existing datasets<li>Data documentation<li>Data ecosystems</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2101.00027.pdf">The Pile: An 800GB Dataset of Diverse Text for Language Modeling</a></ul><dt>Mon Jan 24<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/security">Security and privacy</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2012.07805.pdf">Extracting Training Data from Large Language Models</a></ul><dt>Wed Jan 26<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/legality">Legal considerations</a><dd><strong href="https://texaslawreview.org/fair-learning/">Fair Learning</a></ul></dl></div><h2 class="fs-4" id="building-large-language-models" > <a href="#building-large-language-models" class="anchor-heading" aria-labelledby="building-large-language-models"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" aria-hidden="true"><use xlink:href="#svg-link"></use></svg></a> Building large language models</h2><div class="module"><dl><dt>Mon Jan 31<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/modeling">Modeling</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/1901.02860.pdf">Transformer-XL: Attentive Language Models beyond a Fixed-Length Context</a></ul><dt>Wed Feb 2<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/training">Training</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Objective functions<li>Stability<li>Debugging</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2003.10555.pdf">ELECTRA: Pre-training Text Encoders as Discriminators Rather Than Generators</a></ul><dt>Mon Feb 7<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/parallelism">Parallelism</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label href="https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/deepspeed-extreme-scale-model-training-for-everyone/">DeepSpeed: Extreme-scale model training for everyone</a></ul><dt>Wed Feb 9<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/scaling-laws">Scaling laws</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Tatsunori Hashimoto</em><dd><ol><li>Scaling laws</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2001.08361.pdf">Scaling Laws for Neural Language Models</a></ul><dt>Mon Feb 14<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/selective-architectures">Modular architectures</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Mixture of experts<li>Memory-augmented (retrieval) models</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2005.11401.pdf">Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Knowledge-Intensive NLP Tasks</a></ul><dt>Wed Feb 16<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures/adaptation">Adaptation</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2104.08691">The Power of Scale for Parameter-Efficient Prompt Tuning</a></ul><dt>Mon Feb 21<dd>no class (Presidentsâ€™ Day)<dt>Wed Feb 23<dd><dl><dt><a href="../lectures-environment">Environmental impact</a><dd><strong class="label label-purple">Lecture</strong> <strong class="label label-green">Discussion</strong></dl><dd><em>Percy Liang</em><dd><ol><li>Training and inference costs<li>Carbon emissions</ol><dd>Discussion paper:<ul><li><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2104.10350.pdf">Carbon Emissions and Large Neural Network Training</a></ul></dl></div><h2 class="fs-4" id="beyond-large-language-models" > <a href="#beyond-large-language-models" class="anchor-heading" aria-labelledby="beyond-large-language-models"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" aria-hidden="true"><use xlink:href="#svg-link"></use></svg></a> Beyond large language models</h2><div class="module"><dl><dt>Mon Feb 28<dd><dl><dt>Guest lecture<dd><strong
